description: Manage inbound NAT rules of an IP configuration.

commands.name: az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule add
commands.summary: Add an inbound NAT rule to an IP configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule add --inbound-nat-rule
                                              --ip-config-name
                                              --nic-name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--lb-name]
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule add -g MyResourceGroup --nic-name MyNic -n MyIpConfig --inbound-nat-rule MyNatRule

commands.name: az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule remove
commands.summary: Remove an inbound NAT rule of an IP configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule remove --inbound-nat-rule
                                                 --ip-config-name
                                                 --nic-name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--lb-name]
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule remove -g MyResourceGroup --nic-name MyNic -n MyIpConfig --inbound-nat-rule MyNatRule

commands.name: az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config inbound-nat-rule wait [--created]
                                               [--custom]
                                               [--deleted]
                                               [--exists]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--interval]
                                               [--nic-name]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--timeout]
                                               [--updated]
